remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果提供給區塊的項目數目不平均地被提供給區塊的建構函式的批次大小，該區塊的最後的批次可能會包含少於所要求的項目數目。If the number of items provided to the block is not evenly divisible by the batch size provided to the block's constructor, the block's final batch may contain fewer than the requested number of items.

summary.span: Signals to the that it should not accept nor produce any more messages nor consume any more postponed messages.

span.span: Signals to the that it should not accept nor produce any more messages nor consume any more postponed messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後已經在資料流程區塊上呼叫，該區塊將會完成，且其工作會進入最終狀態它已經處理所有先前可用的資料。After has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, and its task will enter a final state after it has processed all previously available data. 將區塊等待完成發生，而是會起始要求但要等待完成發生，可能使用的工作。 will not block waiting for completion to occur, but rather will initiate the request; to wait for completion to occur, the task may be used.

summary.span: Gets a that represents the asynchronous operation and completion of the dataflow block.

span.span: Gets a that represents the asynchronous operation and completion of the dataflow block.
The task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料流程區塊會時視為完成它目前未處理的訊息，以及當它有保證，不會處理任何其他訊息。A dataflow block is considered completed when it is not currently processing a message and when it has guaranteed that it will not process any more messages. 傳回完成相關聯的區塊時，會轉換為已完成狀態。The returned will transition to a completed state when the associated block has completed. 會轉換到區塊完成其處理成功根據資料流程區塊時的狀態定義語意。It will transition to the state when the block completes its processing successfully according to the dataflow block’s defined semantics. 會轉換到狀態時即為資料流程區塊已完成處理提前因未處理的例外狀況，且會轉換到資料流程區塊完成狀態過早處理，因為收到取消要求。It will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to an unhandled exception, and it will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to receiving a cancellation request. 當工作在狀態，其`Exception`屬性會傳回包含造成失敗之區塊的一或多個例外狀況。If the task completes in the state, its `Exception` property will return an containing the one or more exceptions that caused the block to fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後已經在資料流程區塊上呼叫，該區塊將會完成，且其工作將會進入最終狀態。After has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, and its task will enter a final state. 判定為失敗的區塊，做為與取消區塊，會造成遺失緩衝的訊息 （未處理的輸入的訊息，以及 unoffered 的輸出訊息）。Faulting a block, as with canceling a block, causes buffered messages (unprocessed input messages as well as unoffered output messages) to be lost.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有 [ISourceBlock (T\ 執行個體連結到這 [ISourceBlock (T\ 執行個體可以使用 [ISourceBlock （T\，並且它必須只能保留 [ISourceBlock (T\ 執行個體先前提供此來源到目標。Only [ISourceBlock(T\ instances linked to this [ISourceBlock(T\ instance may use [ISourceBlock(T\, and it must only be used to reserve [ISourceBlock(T\ instances previously offered by this source to the target. 如果`true`傳回，則 [ISourceBlock (T\ 後續必須呼叫任何一個 [ISourceBlock (T\ 或 [ISourceBlock (T\ 此訊息。If `true` is returned, the [ISourceBlock(T\ must subsequently call either [ISourceBlock(T\ or [ISourceBlock(T\ for this message. 若要這樣做可能會導致無法傳播到這個或其他目標的任何其他訊息的來源。Failure to do so may result in the source being unable to propagate any further messages to this or other targets. [ISourceBlock (T\ 必須目標所保留的任何內部鎖定，而不呼叫。[ISourceBlock(T\ must not be called while the target is holding any internal locks. 這樣會違反鎖定階層以避免資料流程網路中的死結。Doing so will violate the lock hierarchy necessary to avoid deadlocks in a dataflow network.

returns.span: If the message was accepted by the target, is returned, and the source should no longer use the offered message, because it is now owned by the target.

span.span: If the message was accepted by the target, is returned, and the source should no longer use the offered message, because it is now owned by the target.

returns.span: If the message was postponed by the target, is returned as a notification that the target may later attempt to consume or reserve the message; in the meantime, the source still owns the message and may offer it to other blocks.

summary.span: Triggers the to initiate a batching operation even if the number of currently queued or postponed items is less than the .

span.span: Triggers the to initiate a batching operation even if the number of currently queued or postponed items is less than the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在窮盡模式，批次會產生從佇列項目，即使較少的存在比批次大小。In greedy mode, a batch will be generated from queued items even if fewer exist than the batch size. 在非窮盡模式中，批次將會產生以非同步方式從延後的項目即使可以耗用超過批次大小所指定的項目數量。In non-greedy mode, a batch will be generated asynchronously from postponed items even if fewer items than specified by the batch size can be consumed.
